verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Watumishi wake Baba
wangapi waliopo,
wanakula na kusaza
chakula chake Baba.

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Nami — Nami nataabika hapa
Nashi — Nashiriki na nguruwe
Chaku — Chakula kisichofaa,
yanipasa kurudi.

verse.name: c2
verse.lines:
Nita — Nitarudi na kusema
Baba — Baba yangu nisamehe
Nime — Nimekosa kwake Mungu
Na mbele yako Baba.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Baba kamwona yu mbali
kashikwa na huruma,
akakimbia kumlaki kamkumbata
na busu.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Baba sistahili tena
kuitwa mwana wako
unifanye kama mmoja
wa watumishi wako.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Baba yangu nimekosa
ninaomba huruma
unisamehe nirudi
nikakutumikie.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
Bwana karibisha mimi
kwenye karamu yako
meza imeandaliwa
inaningoja mimi.

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
Nasongea ninakuja
ninakukimbilia
mimi ni mtoto mpotevu
Baba unipokee.

verse.name: v7
verse.lines:
Nimekula nimeshiba
nakushukuru Baba
chakula kama asali
asante sana Baba.
